Header.title: Daily Memory Tales
Header.subtitle: Capture beautiful moments in comic diary

Common.autoAnalyzeFacialFeatures: Automatically analyze facial features and style elements
Common.oneSentenceDescription: One sentence description, unlimited scene possibilities • Professional composition • Instant generation
Common.characterSelection: Character Selection • Intelligent Analysis • Exclusive Story Generation
Common.afterCreation: After creation, you can share your work to the community and get likes and comments from other users
Common.companyDescription: Harjimi AI is committed to providing users with the most advanced AI comic generation technology. We combine artificial intelligence with creative design, allowing everyone to easily create unique comic works and unleash unlimited creative possibilities.
Common.aiComicTech: AI Comic Generation Technology | Creative Design Services

Login.subtitle: Choose your login method
Login.signupSubtitle: Enter verification code to complete registration
Login.emailHint: New email will create an account automatically, existing email will receive a login verification code

HomePage.title: Not Just a Free Comic Generator
HomePage.description1: From photos to complete stories, AI brings your memories into comic creation.
HomePage.description2: No complex tools, no learning curve, just AI-powered comic intelligent agents.
HomePage.stepUploadPhotoGenerateStyles: Step · Upload Photo to Generate Multi-Style Characters
HomePage.uploadPhotoDescription: Upload your precious photos, AI analyzes facial features and style elements, and generates exclusive character avatars and setting images in multiple styles. The right side shows different style effects, supporting multi-style creation.
HomePage.aiSceneDescription: From simple descriptions, AI intelligently generates rich and diverse scene compositions. From warm daily life to romantic moments, from urban nightscapes to pastoral scenery, creating unlimited possibilities for visual expression.
HomePage.simpleInputDescription: With just 8 words, AI can generate diverse scene compositions based on the selected style
HomePage.quietCountrysideDesc: Orange trees in the countryside yard, a girl enjoying her afternoon time alone
HomePage.urbanLoveDesc: Neon-lit urban night, a girl walking alone searching for love
HomePage.meetingUnderBlueSkyDesc: Fresh blue sky and white clouds background, gentle romantic moments between lovers
HomePage.greenWeddingDesc: Outdoor wedding scene surrounded by natural greenery, a happy and complete moment
HomePage.multiCharacterDescription: Select multiple characters, AI intelligently generates interactive stories between characters, creating rich character relationships and plot development
HomePage.multiCharacterDetailDesc: Choose 2-4 characters from your character library, AI will generate exclusive multi-character interactive stories based on character settings, personality traits, and relationship backgrounds.
HomePage.characterRelationshipDesc: AI analyzes personality compatibility and relationship types between characters, generating interactions that match character settings
HomePage.diverseStoryDesc: Supports various story types including romantic love, friendship adventures, family warmth, etc.
HomePage.personalizedPlotDesc: Based on character background settings, generates personalized plots that match character growth trajectories
HomePage.threeStepsTitle: Simple Three Steps, Generate Multi-Character Stories
HomePage.step1: Select 2-4 character combinations from character library
HomePage.step2: Choose story type and scene settings
HomePage.step3: AI generates exclusive multi-character interactive stories
HomePage.userReviewsDescription: See how other users create wonderful stories with AI, share your creative achievements
HomePage.communityCreationsDesc: Wonderful creations from users, showcasing the unlimited possibilities of AI comic generation
HomePage.shareCreationDesc: After creation, you can share your work to the community and get likes and comments from other users
HomePage.threeStepsSubtitle: Simple three steps, create your exclusive memories
HomePage.threeStepsUploadDesc: Upload the portrait photos you want to convert
HomePage.threeStepsGenerateDesc: AI converts photos into cartoon characters
HomePage.threeStepsStoryDesc: Create warm story scenes with characters

WorkshopPage.title: AI Comic Generator Workshop
WorkshopPage.subtitle: Upload images, analyze facial features, generate exclusive sketch characters
WorkshopPage.uploadToStart: Upload an image and click analyze button to start analysis
WorkshopPage.clickToStartAnalysis: Click button to start analysis and generate sketch
WorkshopPage.completeToUnlock: Complete the previous step to unlock

CharacterGeneration.step1Description: Select a clear portrait photo, we will generate a character based on this photo
CharacterGeneration.step2Description: AI will generate exclusive character avatar and three-view images for you, and save them to your character library
CharacterGeneration.step3Description: Use your characters to start creating exclusive comic stories
CharacterGeneration.canCreateComics: You can now use {count} characters to create your exclusive comics

ComicGeneration.createCharactersFirstTip: 💡 Tip: You need to create characters first before generating comics

DiaryInput.placeholder:
Write your story here...

For example:
Xiao Ming met a cute kitten in the park today. The kitten was very shy and hid behind a tree. Xiao Ming took out some dried fish and carefully approached. Finally, the kitten was attracted by the food and became good friends with Xiao Ming.

ComicDisplay.writeStoryFirst: Write a story and click generate button

Character.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
Character.creationHint: When creating stories, you can use the character name
Character.toSpecifyActions: to specify this character's actions and dialogue.
Character.exampleText: "{name} happily runs to the garden" or "{name} says: 'What a beautiful day!'"
